Caption: Sitting from left: Mr. R. Natarajan, Registrar, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Chairman, Board of Governors and Prof. B. Sengupto, Director
Description: Prof. Ajit Kolar calls the three dignitaries shown above the “Second Trinity of IIT Madras”. The first trinity comprises of President Heuss, Chancellor Adenauer and President Nehru according to Prof. Kolar.
